title: 服务器启动器打不开
author: 纯在感
txt_content:
[12:01:20] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[12:01:21] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[12:01:21] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[12:01:21] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[12:01:21] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.2.63
  Time: 2016-07-07 12:01:21
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.NullPointerException

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.version.MinecraftLibrary.getDownloadInfo(MinecraftLibrary.java:142)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.download.MinecraftDownloadService.getDownloadLibraries(MinecraftDownloadService.java:60)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.GameLauncher.makeLaunchCommand(GameLauncher.java:102)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 7 (x86), 6.1
  Java Version: 1.8.0_91, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation
错误报告大神帮忙看下

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content: 由于HMCL作者已弃坑，所以HMCL由另一个公司进行维护，但是这个公司水平特别烂，于是更新出了一堆Bug。建议换启动器，试试BMCL和BakaXL。

replies.author: q1224344027
replies.txt_content:
b2226913129 发表于 2016-7-7 16:40
换启动器
换启动器，如果不行，说明你的服务器文件修改没到位

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content:
hmcl启动器出了些问题
先用旧版http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dFwkLSt
或者其它启动器

replies.author: 纯在感
replies.txt_content: 各种方法试过了都不行..

replies.author: 纯在感
replies.txt_content:
我用了其他的启动器说是A Java Exception has occurred好像是虚拟机错误
那怎么修复啊

replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
补全资源文件
另：现在HMCL已经易主，原来的下载地址没人维护，新来的技术是个渣渣 所以别用HMCL了
